definitions: something for a hand to grip on

examples.text: the rock is steep and there are few handholds

shortDefinitions: something for hand to grip on

definitions: hold (a camera) in the hand when taking a photograph or making a video recording, as opposed to using a tripod

examples.text: we could hand-hold the camera at very slow shutter speeds with hardly any blur

shortDefinitions: hold camera in hand when taking photograph

definitions: support or guide (someone) during a learning process or a period of change

examples.text: if you ask a mentor how to register, he or she will hand-hold you through the procedure

shortDefinitions: support or guide someone during learning process
